title: Transition risk - fossil fuel sector
description: You can explore here: What are transition risks for the fossil fuel sector?

options.label: What are the direct emission costs for fossils?
options.text: Direct emissions costs are the costs of emitting CO2 and other greenhouse gases relative to a baseline scenario. Increased costs are driven by the amount of emissions per period, and the associated carbon-equivalent price.

options.label: How do revenues change?
options.text: Revenue can change due to changing costs and thus changing demand patterns by customers.

options.label: How can the extraction of fossil quantities change?
options.text: Quantities of fossil fuels can change due to changing costs and thus changing demand patterns by customers.
